name: SSM - Stupid Single Mind
description: This demo was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2019. In order to adhere with the theme, I decided to try a game where multiple characters respond to the same, single command. Now it is just 4 levels, so to make it harder I also added a single life. Once you die, you start back at the beginning. But don't worry, you can always reload with the R button before losing all your stupid single minds!
